special_powers.name: MIRACLO PILL
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Batman a free action and place 3 Miraclo tokens on this card. As long as a Miraclo token is on this card, he can use Perplex, Super Strength, and Willpower, but he can only use Perplex to target himself. At the beginning of your turn, remove a Miraclo token from this card.

special_powers.name: APOKOLIPS RISING
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with the Apokolips keyword and a higher point value can use Mastermind, but only to deal damage to friendly characters whose name includes Parademon.

special_powers.name: AMAZONS OF THEMYSCIRA
special_powers.description: When Amazon is adjacent to one or more friendly characters with the Amazon keyword, modify her attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: YOUR FAILURES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, modify the chosen character's defense value by -1.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: YOUR DISTRACTIONS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, modify the chosen character's speed and range values by -1.

special_powers.name: HIGH-LEVEL CONTAINMENT
special_powers.description: Soldier can use Plasticity. Give Soldier a free action and choose an adjacent opposing character of 100 points or more. That character can't use the Improved Movement ability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: EXPOSE YOUR SECRETS
special_powers.description: Accountable can use Outwit. When he does, he can use Improved Targeting: Hindering and doesn't need range or line of fire if the target is occupying hindering terrain within 10 squares.

special_powers.name: WORLDS' FINEST: YOU CAN'T ALWAYS DEPEND ON YOUR POWERS, KARA
special_powers.description: Friendly characters named Power Girl modify their combat values by +1 if they have a power or ability countered.

special_powers.name: WORLD'S FINEST: I'VE GOT YOUR BACK, HELENA
special_powers.description: Friendly characters named Huntress can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: METAL-O VIRUS
special_powers.description: Modify the combat values of adjacent opposing characters with the Armor, Robot, or Vehicle keywords by -1.

special_powers.name: IRON WILL
special_powers.description: Steel can use Invincible and Willpower.

special_powers.name: NEWSBOY GUARDIAN
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Newsboy Legion is on the map, Guardian can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: SHIELD BASH
special_powers.description: Guardian can use Quake. When he does, hit characters are given an action token.

special_powers.name: CONTAINMENT SUIT RUPTURE
special_powers.description: Captain Atom can use Toughness. Captain Atom can use Regeneration as a free acition and the d6 can't be rerolled. When he does and the roll is a 1, deal 2 penetrating damage to each character within 3 squares of him, then KO Captain Atom.

special_powers.name: SUPERHUMAN STRATEGIST
special_powers.description: Captain Atom can use Enhancement and Leadership.

special_powers.name: ELECTROMAGNETIC PULSE
special_powers.description: Coldcast can use Pulse Wave. When he does, after actions resolve, counter the defense power on each hit opposing character until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MAGICAL HAT
special_powers.description: Once per turn, you can either: give Hat a free action and choose a standard attack power, or give Hat a power action and choose a standard damage power. Hat can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SYMBEASTS
special_powers.description: Menagerie can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Superman was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Superman a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: STANDING TALL
special_powers.description: Give Superman a free action and remove 1 Outnumbered token from this card and he can use Willpower this turn.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Wonder Woman was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Wonder Woman a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: STANDING TALL
special_powers.description: Give Wonder Woman a free action and remove 1 Outnumbered token from this card and she can use Willpower this turn.

special_powers.name: DEFLECTING BRACELETS
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When Wonder Woman is targeted by a ranged combat attack that misses her, after actions resolve give the attacker an action token. If you can't, deal the attacker 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Superman II is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Superman II. If you do, Superman II begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: PACIFIST IDEALS
special_powers.description: Superman II can use Incapacitate. When he uses it as a close combat action and hits, after actions resolve he can use it again as a free action targeting the same character. Characters hit by his Incapacitate can't ignore pushing damage this turn.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Brutaal is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Brutaal. If you do, Brutaal begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: CONQUERING HERO OF APOKOLIPS
special_powers.description: When Brutaal is closer to an opponent's starting area than his own, he can use Willpower. When a friendly character with the Apokolips keyword is closer to an opponent's starting area than its own, modify that character's attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: SPAWN OF APOKOLIPS
special_powers.description: Brutaal can use Super Strength. Opposing characters can't target him with Outwit unless it is granted by the Superman Enemy team ability.

special_powers.name: TREASURE HUNTER
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn if Hawkgirl is occupying printed hindering terrain, you may roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. On a roll of 6, once per game you may choose an object that costs 8 points or less from outside the game and place it in her square. If it can be equipped, equip it.

special_powers.name: RIDE THE CYCLONE
special_powers.description: Red Tornado can use Force Blast normally or as a free action. When she activates Force Blast, after actions resolve, if the target is still adjacent to her, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: CHARM THE WEAK-WILLED
special_powers.description: When she is targeted with an attack by an opposing character that can't use Willpower, Mermaid modifies her defense value by +2.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: Apollo can't be targeted by Outwit or Probability Control from opposing characters unless the targeting character has a higher point value or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: THE MERCY OF APOLLO
special_powers.description: When Apollo hits an opposing character that opposing player must choose: this attack deals penetrating damage, or that character can't attack Apollo until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ANIMALS ARE MY DOMAIN
special_powers.description: An Animal themed team may include Circe and is still a themed team.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF MEN
special_powers.description: Circe can use Mind Control. When she does, she isn't dealt unavoidable damage from using Mind Control.

special_powers.name: QUEEN OF A BESTIAL ARMY
special_powers.description: Circe can use Leadership and Mastermind. When she uses Leadership and succeeds, she may choose an adjacent friendly character of 75 points or less and one of the following: Battle Fury, Blades/Claws/Fangs, or the Flight ability. That character can use the chosen power/ability this turn.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: Artemis can't be targeted by Outwit or Probability Control from opposing characters unless the targeting character has a higher point value or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: AMAZONIAN WARFARE
special_powers.description: Artemis can use Charge and Stealth.

special_powers.name: I LOVE A CHALLENGE
special_powers.description: When Artemis attacks only the highest point opposing character, modify her attack and damage values by +1 for the attack, and the damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: YOUR PLANS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't be given power actions.

special_powers.name: SUPERMAN WAS HERE? WHERE?
special_powers.description: Give Clark Kent a power action and place adjacent a Superman bystander token as described on this card. Immediately give that bystander token an action that does not count towards your action total, then remove it from the game after that action resolves.

special_powers.name: TRANSFORM INTO GIANT TURTLE BOY!
special_powers.description: Jimmy Olsen can be played at 25 points or 60 points. If Jimmy Olsen is 25 points, he is KO'd when he crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: SUPERMAN SIGNAL WATCH
special_powers.description: Give Jimmy Olsen a power action if an opposing character is within 4 squares and line of fire and place a friendly character named Superman adjacent to Jimmy Olsen. The placed Superman can't be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: YOUR EVASIONS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't use Shape Change or Super Senses.

special_powers.name: GIANT TURTLE BOY, THE SUPER-MENACE
special_powers.description: Jimmy Olsen can use Battle Fury and has "dolphin speed symbol" and "giant damage symbol".

special_powers.name: LET'S DO WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE
special_powers.description: General Lane and adjacent friendly characters can use the Superman Enemy team ability.

special_powers.name: GRUFF LEADERSHIP
special_powers.description: General Lane can use Enhancement and Leadership. When he uses Leadership and succeeds, he is considered a higher point value than any friendly character with the Soldier keyword.

special_powers.name: TRANSFORM INTO THE INSECT QUEEN!
special_powers.description: Lana Lang can be played at 20 points or 50 points. If she is 20 points, she is KO'd when she crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: ALL THE SHOCKING DETAILS... FULL COVERAGE AT 8
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character's combat values can't be increased or replaced with a value higher than its printed values.

special_powers.name: INSECT QUEEN WINGS!
special_powers.description: Lana Lang can use Super Senses and Toughness, and has "wing speed symbol".

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Ulysses is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Ulysses. If you do, Ulysses begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: UNSTABLE ENERGY TRANSFERENCE
special_powers.description: Ulysses ignores damage dealt by Pulse Wave and can't be targeted by Penetrating/Psychic Blast. This ability can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: MY BROTHER WAS A TERRIBLE LEADER, BUT I'M NOT HIM
special_powers.description: When you build your force, characters with the Justice League or Suicide Squad keywords possess the Justice League Elite keyword this game.

special_powers.name: LET'S DO IT BLOODY RIGHT THIS TIME
special_powers.description: Sister Superior can use Leadership and Shape Change. When she uses Leadership and succeeds, friendly characters that share a keyword with her modify their attack values by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Wonder Woman was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Wonder Woman a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can't be targeted by opposing Outwit or Probability Control unless the targeting character is more points or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: GIFT OF HERMES
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Charge, Flurry, and Sidestep.

special_powers.name: NEW GODDESS OF WAR
special_powers.description: At the end of your opponent's turn, deal 1 penetrating damage to each character on that player's force within 2 squares of Wonder Woman that didn't make an attack this turn.

special_powers.name: CIRCLE OF PROTECTION
special_powers.description: Doctor Fate can use Energy Shield/Deflection, Regeneration, and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TEMPT FATE
special_powers.description: Doctor Fate can use Probability Control. Give Doctor Fate a power action and modify the attack values of all other friendly characters by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: THE GREEN WILL NOT LET ME DIE
special_powers.description: The first time each game that Green Lantern would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #5, then for the rest of the game when Green Lantern clears action tokens, you may heal him 1 click. This ability can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: Hermes can't be targeted by Outwit or Probability Control from opposing characters unless the targeting character has a higher point value or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: CADUCEUS SNAKE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, you may place adjacent two Caduceus Snake bystander tokens as described on this card. Give Hermes a power action if there are no friendly Caduceus Snakes on the map, and you may place two adjacent two Caduceus Snake bystander tokens.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: First Born can't be targeted by Outwit or Probability Control from opposing characters unless the targeting character has a higher point value or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: SCION OF HATE
special_powers.description: All characters within 3 squares can use Battle Fury. Friendly characters adjacent to First Born modify their attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: STRENGTH TO SHATTER THE EARTH
special_powers.description: First Born can use Super Strength. He can use Quake with a locked damage value of 3.

special_powers.name: MANY DEATHS AND MIND SWAPS
special_powers.description: Dr. Cyber can use Regeneration. When she does and heals at least 1 click, after actions resolve she can use Mind Control as a free action.

special_powers.name: PERFECT BLEND OF MECHANICAL AND MYSTICAL
special_powers.description: Dr. Cyber can use Perplex and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: YOU WANT ME TO HELP YOU
special_powers.description: Doctor Psycho can use Mind Control and Stealth. When he uses Mind Control, he isn't dealt unavoidable damage from using it and after actions resolve he may use Outwit targeting each opposing character hit by his Mind Control.

special_powers.name: YOU'VE BEEN VERY BAD
special_powers.description: Doctor Psycho can use Perplex, but only to decrease combat values. If he does and targets an opposing character of 100 or more points, he may modify a combat value except damage by -2 instead.

special_powers.name: BARGAIN WITH MARS
special_powers.description: Silver Swan can use Super Strength.

special_powers.name: THE SWAN'S SONG
special_powers.description: Silver Swan can use Pulse Wave. When she does, her damage value becomes 2 and is locked; after actions resolve all objects and walls within 3 squares are destroyed.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Superman Blue is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Superman Blue. If you do, Superman Blue begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: RED ENERGY ABSORPTION AND RELEASE
special_powers.description: Superman Blue can use Force Blast. Superman Blue and adjacent friendly characters ignore damage dealt by Pulse Wave. This ability can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Superman Red is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Superman Red. If you do, Superman Red begins the game with an action token. If you also have SMWW 041a Superman Blue on your sideline, you may instead replace the chosen character of points equal to or higher than their combined points with both of them.

special_powers.name: BLUE ENERGY ABSOPTION AND RELEASE
special_powers.description: Superman Red can use Force Blast. Superman Red and adjacent friendly characters ignore damage dealt by Energy Explosion.

special_powers.name: LEGS ON LAND, FINS IN THE WATER
special_powers.description: When Lori Lemaris occupies water terrain, she has "dolphin speed symbol" and modifies her defense value by +2. When she begins an action in water terrain, modify her speed value by +2.

special_powers.name: THE SEA SINGS OF THEM
special_powers.description: When Lori Lemaris or a friendly character named Mermaid is KO'd by an opposing character, opposing characters within 5 squares of the KO'd character that are occupying water terrain are each dealt 2 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: EVERYONE LOVES A MERMAID... SUPERMAN MOST OF ALL
special_powers.description: Lori Lemaris can use Mind Control and isn't dealt unavoidable damage from using it. She can use it as a free action, but only to target characters named Superman or Superboy.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN
special_powers.description: If H'El is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with H'El. If you do, H'El begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT AND TWISTED
special_powers.description: H'El can use Perplex. When he uses it on an opposing character, after actions resolve he can use Outwit to target that character or use Perplex a second time to target himself.

special_powers.name: UNINHIBITED PSIONICS
special_powers.description: Maxima can use Telekinesis and Mind Control.

special_powers.name: I'VE CHOSEN YOU KRYPTONIAN
special_powers.description: When Maxima is adjacent to the highest point opposing character, she can use Mind Control as a free action, but only to target that character.

special_powers.name: SIBLING RIVALRY
special_powers.description: When Lady Blaze is within 3 squares of a friendly character named Lord Satanus and on a higher click number than that character, she can use Stealth and Willpower. If a friendly character named Lord Satanus has been KO'd this game, Lady Blaze can use Stealth and the Quintessence team ability.

special_powers.name: A DEVIL'S BARGAIN
special_powers.description: When an opposing character makes an attack with an attack or damage value higher than its printed value, put a Bargain token on that character's card. When Lady Blaze targets a character with a Bargain token on its card with an attack, she may increase a combat value by +1 for each Bargain token that she removes from that card.

special_powers.name: SIBLING RIVALRY
special_powers.description: When Lord Satanus is within 3 squares of a friendly character named Lady Blaze and on a higher click number than that character, he can use Poison and Willpower. If a friendly character named Lady Blaze has been KO'd this game, Lord Satanus can use Poison and the Quintessence team ability.

special_powers.name: REIGN IN HELL
special_powers.description: Lord Satanus can using Phasing/Teleport. At the beginning of your turn, if Lord Satanus is closer to the opponent's starting area than his starting area, choose one: heal him of 1 damage or Lord Satanus's powers can't be countered until your next turn.

special_powers.name: I LEARN SECRETS, THAT'S THE JOB
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't use team abilities.

special_powers.name: HUNTING DOWN A LEAD
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't draw lines of fire to Lois Lane unless they are within 2 squares or she's adjacent to a friendly character.

special_powers.name: HE'S HERE WHEN I NEED HIM
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters named Superman can use Defend. If this power is revealed when taking damage from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. If you do, you may place a friendly character named Superman adjacent to Lois Lane.

special_powers.name: A NEW KIND OF JUSTICE LEAGUE
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with the Justice League keyword can use the Superman Enemy team ability. When they do, Lex Luthor is considered a higher point value than adjacent friendly characters with the Justice League keyword.

special_powers.name: LIKE IT OR NOT, YOU LISTEN TO ME NOW
special_powers.description: Lex Luthor can use Leadership and Mastermind. When he does, he is considered a higher point value than adjacent characters with the Justice League keyword.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Superman was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Superman a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: STRONGEST HERO OF ALL
special_powers.description: Superman can use Super Strength. When Superman hits a character with a close combat attack and the attack roll is 10 or higher, you may knock back that character a number of squares equal to the attack roll, ignoring all terrain along the path. Destroy all blocking terrain along that path and deal that character damage equal to the number of walls and number of squares of blocking terrain destroyed, maximum 5.

special_powers.name: LOYAL COMPANION
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Superman, Superboy, or Supergirl within 8 squares takes damage from an attack, after actions resolve you may place Krypto in a square adjacent to the attacking character.

special_powers.name: SIC 'EM, BOY!
special_powers.description: Krypto can use Charge and Plasticity.

special_powers.name: KRYPTONIAN NOSE
special_powers.description: Krypto ignores opposing character's Shape Change.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN
special_powers.description: If Wraith is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Wraith. If you do, Wraith begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: ABSORPTION
special_powers.description: Wraith can use Toughness. Each time an opposing character damages Wraith, place two Absorption tokens on this card. At the beginning of your turn, you may remove an Absorption token and either heal Wraith 1 click or modify his attack value by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: KRYPTONITE SPIKES
special_powers.description: Adjacent opposing characters 150 points or more modify their combat values by -1.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Vartox is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Vartox. If you do, Vartox begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: THE REST OF THE HYPER-POWERS
special_powers.description: Give Vartox a free action and choose a standard speed, attack, or defense power that you didn't choose during your last turn. Until your next turn Vartox can use that power instead of the power in that slot on his dial.

special_powers.name: TRANSFER MY STRENGTH AROUND
special_powers.description: Vartox can use Perplex. When he does, you may increase a combat value except damage by +2 and then decrease Vartox's defense value by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Supergirl was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Supergirl a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: LAST DAUGHTER OF KRYPTON
special_powers.description: When Supergirl is the only character on your force, modify her combat values by +1.

special_powers.name: NO PLACE TO HIDE
special_powers.description: Supergirl can use Sidestep and Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking.

special_powers.name: STANDING FAST
special_powers.description: Give Supergirl a free action and remove 1 Outnumbered token from this card to modify her speed value by +3 this turn.

special_powers.name: RAGE: FOR A LOST HOME
special_powers.description: Supergirl can use Poison, and deals penetrating damage when using it.

special_powers.name: DRIVEN BY VENGEANCE
special_powers.description: Supergirl can use Combat Reflexes and Toughness.

special_powers.name: JUST STAY DOWN!
special_powers.description: When Supergirl hits an opposing character with a close combat attack, roll a d6 after actions resolve. On a result of 4-6, that character possesses Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn.

special_powers.name: IONIZING RADIATION
special_powers.description: Atomic Skull can use Energy Explosion, Poison, and deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BLACK DIAMOND POSSESSION
special_powers.description: When Eclipso is KO'd or if you pay 25 points when building your force, equip this character to a friendly character and link it to that character's dial.    At the beginning of your turn or after this character is clicked, you may choose 1 power on the equipped dial and 1 combat value on the equipped dial higher than this character's same printed combat value. This character can use that power and modifies that combat value by +1 until your next turn or clicked.

special_powers.name: ECLIPSED
special_powers.description: Eclipso can use Mind Control. When he does and hits only one character, you may replace any of the hit character's combat values with Eclipso's printed combat values until actions resolve.

special_powers.name: THE EBONY BLADE OF ECLIPSO
special_powers.description: Eclipso can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Steal Energy. If he uses Blades/Claws/Fangs and the d6 roll is 5-6 he heals 2 damage when using Steal Energy instead of 1.

special_powers.name: SOUL MAGIC
special_powers.description: When Faust KO's a character, you may choose a standard power from that character's card. He can use that power until he chooses again.

special_powers.name: SHADOW WALK
special_powers.description: Faust can use Sidestep. When he does and occupies hindering terrain, before moving you may place him in any square of hindering terrain within 4 squares.

special_powers.name: STEAL ESSENCE
special_powers.description: Give Faust a power action when he is adjacent to an opposing character. Deal an adjacent opposing character 1 penetrating damage and heal Faust 1 click.

special_powers.name: POCKET DIMENSION
special_powers.description: When making an attack roll, Faust may roll 3 dice instead of 2 and then choose 1 die to ignore.

special_powers.name: DIVINE AURA
special_powers.description: Hades can't be targeted by opposing Outwit or Probability Control unless the targeting character is more points or has the Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: DOOM'S DOORWAY SWINGS BOTH WAYS
special_powers.description: When a non-bystander character is KO'd, place a bystander token adjacent to Hades as described on this card. If that character was 100 points or less, the placed bystander token is a Suffering Soul; otherwise it is a Heroic Soul.

special_powers.name: DEFY ME AT YOUR PERIL
special_powers.description: When an opposing character's special power is revealed that stops its dial from turning, its controller must choose either deal 1 unavoidable damage to that character or modify Hades' combat values by +1 for the rest of this game.

special_powers.name: KILL YOUR GREATEST HEROES
special_powers.description: When a friendly character KO's the highest-point opposing character, put a Despair token on this card. Opposing characters modify their attack and defense values by -1 for each Despair token on this card. When a friendly character is KO'd, remove a Despair token from this card.

special_powers.name: CONQUERING MILITARY LEADER OF APOKOLIPS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the Apokolips keyword is closer to an opponent's starting area than its own and damages one or more opposing characters with an attack, after actions resolve remove an action token from that character.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Superdoom is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Superdoom. If you do, Superdoom begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: THE ODDS ARE AGAINST ME
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Superdoom was given a non-free action this turn and an opposing force has more characters on the map than your force, place an Outnumbered token on this card. Give Superdoom a free action and remove 2 Outnumbered tokens from this card to make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: CREATED WITH NO EQUAL
special_powers.description: When Superdoom is dealt penetrating damage, it can be reduced.  Superdoom can't be targeted by Outwit unless the targeting character possesses the Kryptonian keyword, Superman Ally team symbol, or is a higher point value.

special_powers.name: RELENTLESS AGGRESSION
special_powers.description: Superdoom can use Battle Fury, Exploit Weakness, and the Colossal Stamina ability.

special_powers.name: MESSING AROUND WITH THE ODDS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and place the rolled result on this card. Give Mr. Mxyzptlk a power action if there is no d6 on this card, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and place the rolled result on this card. Whenever any dice that can be rerolled are rolled (including as part of a 2d6 roll), you may remove the d6 from this card and replace one of those die results with the rolled result from the d6 removed from this card.

special_powers.name: KEEPING UP WITH THE KRYPTONIANS
special_powers.description: Mr. Mxyzptlk can use Phasing/Teleport. When he has 2 action tokens, he may use it as a free action.

special_powers.name: ZEROING THE PLAYING FIELD
special_powers.description: Mr. Mxyzptlk can use Pulse Wave, but deals no damage when doing so. Instead, give each hit character up to 2 action tokens.

special_powers.name: LITTLE IMP FROM THE 5TH DIMENSION
special_powers.description: Give Mr. Mxyzptlk a free action and choose a character within 3 squares and line of fire. The chosen character gains "tiny damage symbol", "normal damage symbol", "giant damage symbol", or "colossal damage symbol" instead of its damage symbol until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BOMBS PLANTED EVERYWHERE
special_powers.description: Each time an opposing character destroys an object or printed blocking terrain or KO's a friendly character of 25 points or more, after actions resolve roll a d6. On a roll of 5 - 6, deal that opposing character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: ANARCHY IN BLACK
special_powers.description: Batman can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: RED SUN LIGHTS
special_powers.description: Batman can use Outwit. When he does, you may counter any number of powers that character possesses.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Bizarro is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Bizarro. If you do, Bizarro begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: RADIATIVE X-RAY VISION
special_powers.description: Bizarro can use Pulse Wave with a range value of 10. If targeting more than 1 character, his damage value becomes 2 and is locked.

special_powers.name: HELLO EVERYBODY, ME VERY PLEASED TO MEET YOU
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed due to damage from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. When another friendly character would be hit by an attack, you may choose to have that character evade the attack. If you do, deal Bizarro 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: YOU CAN'T REPROGRAM ME, YOU WERE UNDER MY COMMAND
special_powers.description: When Brainiac is KO'd or if you pay 25 points when building your force, equip this character to a friendly character and link it to that character's dial.    At the beginning of your turn or after this character is clicked, you may choose 1 power on the equipped dial and 1 combat value on the equipped dial higher than this character's same printed combat value. This character can use that power and modifies that combat value by +1 until your next turn or clicked.

special_powers.name: WORLD IS RUNNING LIKE CLOCKWORK
special_powers.description: Once per turn when an opposing character is given a power action, you may immediately remove an action token from Brainiac.

special_powers.name: EMPOWER A BRIGADE
special_powers.description: Friendly characters of 40 points or less can use Toughness and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: BOX WITHIN A BOX WITHIN AN INFINITE NUMBER OF BOXES
special_powers.description: Green Light can use Barrier. When he does, instead of placing markers normally, you may choose a single base opposing character within range and line of fire and place a blocking terrain marker in each unoccupied square adjacent to the character. That character gains Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn. At the beginning of your next turn before removing the markers, give the chosen character an action token if it's adjacent to at least three of these markers.

special_powers.name: SURVIVED FOUR YEARS AS A COMMUNIST P.O.W.
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed due to taking damage from an opposing character's attack stop turning the dial. Green Light can use Super Senses. When he does and succeeds you may heal him of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: WAIT, THAT'S NOT SUPERMAN...
special_powers.description: If Superman is on your sideline when your opponent's force is revealed and your force includes a character named Superman or Superboy of an equal or higher point value, you may replace that character with Superman. If you do, Superman begins the game with an action token.

special_powers.name: CRIMINALS BECOME "SUPERMAN ROBOTS"
special_powers.description: When Superman hits an opposing character with a close combat attack, put a Lobotomy token on its card. Give Superman a power action and remove any number of his Lobotomy tokens to have Superman use Mind Control as a free action targeting those characters that had at least 1 token removed, regardless of range or line of fire.

special_powers.name: WINTER PALACE
special_powers.description: Superman can use Barrier, Regeneration, and Super Senses. When this click is revealed due to damage from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial, and after actions resolve give the attacker an action token. If you can't, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: EXILE TO A FARMING COLLECTIVE
special_powers.description: Superman can use Leadership. When an opposing character hits Superman, even if this power is lost, after actions resolve you may place that character adjacent to a different opposing character.

special_powers.name: COMMUNISM IS SOCIAL JUSTICE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with a lower point value than Wonder Woman is targeted with an attack, modify the attacker's attack and damage values by -1.

special_powers.name: LASSO OF DOMINATION
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Plasticity and Sidestep. At the beginning of your turn, Wonder Woman can use Mind Control as a free action, targeting an adjacent opposing character.

special_powers.name: CATATONIC STATE IN SUPERMAN'S CARE
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Regeneration. Once per game, when this click is revealed due to damage taken from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. When Wonder Woman is KO'd, remove all action tokens from all friendly characters.

special_powers.name: HIDE AS CLARK
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Superman has two action tokens you may give him a free action and turn him to click #11.

special_powers.name: I CAN'T STAY HIDDEN, I HAVE TO HELP
special_powers.description: When Superman would take damage other than pushing damage, instead turn this dial clockwise a number of clicks equal to 2 plus the damage taken, Superman isn't KO'd when he reaches a KO click unless he stops turning the dial on that click. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD NEEDS TO KNOW: HOW TO SLOW DOWN
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't be given free actions.

special_powers.name: STRONGER AS I AGE
special_powers.description: On click #3 and higher, Superman II has the "Wing" symbol. On click #7 and higher, Superman II has "Indomitable Defense Symbol".

special_powers.name: PROTECT BATMAN WHEN HIS MIRACLO WEARS OFF!
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed due to damage taken from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. Adjacent friendly characters can use Defend. Give Batman II a power action to deal 1 unavoidable damage to himself.

special_powers.name: AVATAR OF THE GREEN
special_powers.description: Green Lantern can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, he may also remove an action token from any adjacent friendly character regardless of point value.

special_powers.name: ALWAYS IN MOTION
special_powers.description: Hawkgirl can use Sidestep. When she does and has no action tokens, her speed value becomes 3 instead of 2.

special_powers.name: CAN'T BE CAUGHT
special_powers.description: Hawkgirl can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses. When she is attacked, she may choose that the attack generates knock back, but she ignores knock back damage from it.

special_powers.name: DUST TORNADO
special_powers.description: Red Tornado can use Smoke Cloud. She can use it as a free action but only to place hindering terrain markers in her square or adjacent squares.

special_powers.name: HEART OF A WHIRLWIND
special_powers.description: Red Tornado can use Super Senses and succeeds on a result of 4-6.

special_powers.name: THE HELMET OF NABU
special_powers.description: Doctor Fate may begin the game equipped with SMWW #S100 The Helmet of Fate without paying its cost. This object doesn't count towards your force. When Doctor Fate clears action tokens, remove a Host token from that card.

special_powers.name: CLAIRVOYANT VISIONS
special_powers.description: Doctor Fate can use Impervious and Willpower. Once during each opponent's turn when a friendly character within 3 squares rolls a single d6, you may reroll the die.

special_powers.name: CENTURIES OF MAGICAL EXPERIENCE
special_powers.description: Doctor Fate can use Enhancement and Empower. When he does, other friendly characters within 3 squares are considered adjacent.

special_powers.name: SMOTHERING HOLD
special_powers.description: The Atom can use Plasticity and Sidestep. At the beginning of your turn, deal 1 penetrating damage to all adjacent opposing characters. When an adjacent character fails a break away roll, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: ATOMIC PUNCH
special_powers.description: Give The Atom a free action if no other Colossal Retalliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked The Atom or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place The Atom such that he can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character, then do so with an area of effect that includes all other characters within 2 squares of the target. Opposing character can't use Combat Reflexes, Shape Change, or Super Senses for this attack. Hit characters are each dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: The Atom can use Toughness. If The Atom began the game on the 15-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: GARGANTUAN ASSAULT
special_powers.description: Batman/Superman Robot can use Multi-Attack.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: ASTEROID-LEVEL IMPACT
special_powers.description: Give Batman/Superman Robot a free action if no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked Batman/Superman Robot or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Batman/Superman Robot such that it can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character, then do so with an area of effect that includes all other characters within 2 squares of the target. Hit characters are each dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage. After actions resolve, destroy all blocking terrain within the area of effect of the attack and place debris markers in all clear terrain within the area of effect of the attack.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: If Batman/Superman Robot began the game on the 25-point starting line, it can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: METALLO ALLOY
special_powers.description: Batman/Superman Robot can use Impervious, but if it would be dealt 4 or more damage, it reduces that damage by 3 instead of 2. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: FLAMING SWORD
special_powers.description: Give Brimstone a free action if no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked Brimestone or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Brimstone such that he can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character along a direct line, then do so with an area of effect that includes all characters along that direct line of fire to the target. Roll a d6, and each hit character is dealt damage equal to the result instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: THROWING FIREBALLS
special_powers.description: Brimstone can use Pulse Wave. When he does you may choose an unoccupied square within 6 squares and line of fire and he can use Pulse Wave as if he occupied that square.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: Brimstone can use Toughness. If Brimstone began the game on his 20-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: PLASMA LEAK
special_powers.description: Brimstone can use Poison and deals penetrating damage while using it.

special_powers.name: GARGANTUAN ASSAULT
special_powers.description: Solaris can use Multi-Attack.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: REPLACE YOUR SUN AND RULE
special_powers.description: Give Solaris a free action if no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked Solaris or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Solaris such that it can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character, then do so with an area of effect that includes all opposing characters within 4 squares of the target. Hit characters are each given an action token instead of normal damage. Any character you can't give an action to is dealt 1 penetrating damage instead.

special_powers.name: WAVES OF THE DEADLIEST RADIATION
special_powers.description: Solaris can use Pulse Wave. You may use Pulse Wave normally or choose that, instead of normal damage, each hit character is dealt damage equal to twice the number of action tokens on it and each hit character with zero action tokens is given an action token.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: Solaris can use Toughness. If Solaris began the game on the 25-point starting line, it can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: MONKEY SEE LOIS, MONKEY DO
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Lois Lane moves, after actions resolve Titano can be given a move action as a free action to move up to the same number of squares. When a friendly character named Lois Lane makes an attack targeting an opposing character, after actions resolve Titano can make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: TWO-FIST PUNCH
special_powers.description: Give Titano a free action if no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked Titano or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Titano such that he can make a close combat attack targeting the chosen character, then make two separate close combat attacks targeting the chosen character each with an area of effect that includes all other characters within 2 squares of the target. Hit characters are each dealt 3 damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: Titano can use Toughness. If Titano began the game on the 20-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: CRUSH WITH GIANT SPIKES
special_powers.description: Give War Wheel a power action if no other Colossal Retaliation power has been activated this turn and choose an opposing character that attacked War Wheel or damaged a friendly character since your last turn and occupies the same row or column as War Wheel. Place War Wheel in any 4 squares in the same rows or columns that contain both all of War Wheel and the chosen character. Make a close combat attack whose area of effect is all characters in those rows or columns between where War Wheel began this action and the squares it currently occupies. Hit characters are each dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: DIRIGIBLE DROP
special_powers.description: Give War Wheel a power action if it occupies a starting area. At the beginning of your next turn, and place it anywhere on the map that isn't a starting area, give it an action token, and it can't use Colossal Stamina that turn.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: War Wheel can use Toughness. If War Wheel began the game on the 15-point starting line, it can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation. When this power is revealed due to damage taken from an opposing character's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: This character can use Incapacitate, Mind Control, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When this character uses any of these powers and hits one or more characters, after actions resolve place a host token on this card, roll a d6, and subtract the number of Host tokens on this card. If the result is 1 or less, place this in the square of a hit target and remove all Host tokens from this card. (To equip, take the object and place it on the standard character's card. The character can use its effects. If the character is KO'd or equipped with a second object, KO the first equipped object.)

special_powers.name: Temple of Mount Olympus
special_powers.description: These squares are Blocking Terrain that can't be destroyed or replaced. Characters can't use Improved Movement or Improved Targetting to ignore the terrain.

special_powers.name: Open Air
special_powers.description: Orange squares are Open Air squares. After actions resolve, if a character who can't use the Flight ability occupies an Open Air square, deal them 1 unavoidable damage, then that character's owner places them in their starting area. Non-held Objects in Open Air squares are removed from the map.

special_powers.name: Glass Walls (Orange Dotted Line
special_powers.description: Glass Walls are walls that do not block line of fire. After an attack resolves, destroy all glass walls which had a line of fire drawn through them by that attack.
